body_html: As for changing the format, I don't think we want to do that. The one-line definitions are way more human friendly and we already have a number of parsers for them (both in Python and in C++).
body_text: As for changing the format, I don't think we want to do that. The one-line definitions are way more human friendly and we already have a number of parsers for them (both in Python and in C++).
body: As for changing the format, I don't think we want to do that. The one-line definitions are way more human friendly and we already have a number of parsers for them (both in Python and in C++).
